text: Pamwe chete nehando imwe neimwe, panofanira kuva nechipiriso chokunwa chehafu yehini yewaini; pamwe chete negondobwe, chikamu chimwe chete kubva muzvitatu chehini28:14 marita angaita 2; uye pamwe chete negwayana rimwe nerimwe, chikamu chimwe chete muzvina chehini28:14 marita angaita 1.2. Ichi ndicho chipiriso chinopiswa chomwedzi mumwe nomumwe chinofanira kupiwa pakugara kwomwedzi mumwe nomumwe pagore.
